item.title: TOST
item.description: score:53 Chances: High growth and low risk are a compelling combination. There are terrific buying opportunities in beaten-down growth stocks right now. Toast completed its initial public offering (IPO) in September of 2021 and has since gone on to increase its number of clients, broaden its offerings across the industry, and lift revenue.
